description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Riyadh Ahmed Make Section & Column Clickable For Elementor make-section-column-clickable-elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Make Section & Column Clickable For Elementor: from n/a through <= 2.3.

product.name: Make Section & Column Clickable For Elementor
